reviewText: I have been downloading Robina's lectures for several months from [..]and was intrigued to find that a film had been made about her.  "Chasing Buddha"  focuses on how Robina found Buddhism and her current work with prisoners. Google "Chasing Buddha" and you'll find hundreds of sites with information on the film and on Robina. What people do not know is that the film is available from the project that she now heads, the Liberation Prison Project at [..], in DVD format. This tough smart activist makes Buddhism understandable for westerners like me who are finding that their spiritual home has Eastern roots.
